list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: perceive with the eyes; discern visually.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: in the distance she could see the blue sea
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ở khoảng cách cô có thể nhìn thấy biển xanh

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: discern or deduce mentally after reflection or from information; understand.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I can't see any other way to treat it
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi không thể nhìn thấy bất kỳ cách nào khác để đối xử với nó

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: experience or witness (an event or situation).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I shall not live to see it
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi sẽ không sống để nhìn thấy nó

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: meet (someone one knows) socially or by chance.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đã thấy Colin đêm qua

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: escort or conduct (someone) to a specified place.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đừng bận tâm nhìn thấy tôi

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Lucy saw to it that everyone got enough to eat
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Lucy thấy rằng mọi người đều đủ ăn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in poker or brag) equal the bet of (an opponent).
the place in which a cathedral church stands, identified as the seat of authority of a bishop or archbishop.
